alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 1:21PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST TUESDAY FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches above 5500-6000 feet, locally over a foot 7500 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Buffalo Pass, Chinle, Ganado, Kayenta, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 PM Tuesday: Buffalo Pass 12 to 18 inches Chinle 1 to 3 inches Ganado 4 to 6 inches Kayenta 0 to 1 inches Shonto 3 to 5 inches Window Rock 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
